com.radirius.mercury.graphics

Interface Graphics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VAOGraphics

    public interface Graphics
    An abstraction for all graphics.
    Author:
    wessles, Jeviny, Sri Harsha Chilakapati

      • drawAnimation

        void drawAnimation(Animation animation,
                 float x,
                 float y)
        Draws an animation taking in the x and y coordinates.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation to draw.
        x - The x position.
        y - The y position.

      • drawAnimation

        void drawAnimation(Animation animation,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 float w,
                 float h)
        Draws an animation taking in the x and y coordinates, plus the width w and height h.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation to draw.
        x - The x position.
        y - The y position.
        w - The width.
        h - The height.

      • drawAnimation

        void drawAnimation(Animation animation,
                 Shape region)
        Draws an animation taking in the boundaries.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation to draw.
        region - The animation's boundaries.

      • drawAnimation

        void drawAnimation(Animation animation,
                 Shape sourceRegion,
                 Shape region)
        Draws an animation taking in the boundaries.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation to draw.
        sourceRegion - The source coordinates of the animation.
        region - The animation's boundaries.
